Package org.h2.jaqu

The implementation of the JaQu (Java Query) tool.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Filter Represents the WHERE clause of a query.
FullQueryInterface<T> The use of query interfaces is to divide different query abilities in different stages of the query.
QueryInterface<T> The use of query interfaces is to divide different query abilities in different stages of the query.
SqlDialect An interface implemented by all Dialects
Table A class that implements this interface can be used as a database table.
Token Classes implementing this interface can be used as a token in a statement.
 

Class Summary
Db This class represents a connection to an underlying data store which supports JDBC.
Define This class provides utility methods to define primary keys, indexes, and set the name of the table.
Function This class provides static methods that represents common SQL functions.
JaquSessionFactory This factory creates persistence session (Db) which work against a single defined data source.
Query<T> This class represents a query.
QueryCondition<T,A> This class represents a query with an incomplete condition.
QueryJoin This class represents a query with a join.
QueryJoinCondition<A> This class represents a query with join and an incomplete condition.
QuerySet<T,F> Represents the 'SET' coomand type within an update query.
QueryWhere<T> This class represents a query with a condition.
SetDirective<A> Use for Update Set directive in an update query.
SQLStatement This class represents a parameterized SQL statement.
TestCondition<A> This class represents an incomplete condition.
 

Enum Summary
CascadeType Types of relation cascading supported by Jaqu
Dialect An enumeration for selecting the Dialect of the underlying storage.
GeneratorType Type of generator Jaqu supports for primary keys on Entities.
InheritedType The type of inheritance supported by Jaqu fro entities.
Types All DB types supported by Jaqu.
 

Package org.h2.jaqu Description

The implementation of the JaQu (Java Query) tool.
